Line 399 should be changed from:
if 
(file.getFileExtension().equals(ILaunchConfiguration.LAUNCH_CONFIGURATION_FILE_EXTENSION)) 
{
to:
if 
(ILaunchConfiguration.LAUNCH_CONFIGURATION_FILE_EXTENSION.equals(file.getFileExtension())) 
{

ARCH team approval: The consequence of not fixing this is that the user is 
unable to open the launch configuration dialog when they select a file resource 
in the workbench that has no file extension and they select "run..." 
or "debug...". An error is written to the log with an NPE stack trace.
